column5: Hi everyone,  I'm planning to do some early spring lake trout fishing either on Lake of Bays, or in Parry Sound. I was wondering if anyone knew some good spots?  Or if you can think of some better lakes let me know.
Lake of Bays is a good choice.  Are you interested in some company?
My boats only 16', and I'm planning on going with my dad and brother.  Sorry, I might make a couple of trips though.  I'll let you know!
I have heard that fishing around the Oxetongue river is good in the spring.  Has anyone had success anywhere else on Lake of Bays?
